body_html: BTW, this list is for bugs and feature requests in TensorFlow. It is common to get NaN's during normal operation. There was probably no response on stackoverflow because such problems are often due to a subtle bug in network design or training, and requires significant effort to track down. If you think this is a bug in TensorFlow, please more specific details of which functionality of TF is misbehaving
